mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_RESULT (TA_HOME_NUM, TA_AWAY_NUM, MR_HOME_SCORE, MR_AWAY_SCORE, MR_WIN_NUM, MR_LOSE_NUM, MR_HOME_MANNER_POINT, MR_AWAY_MANNER_POINT, MR_REQUEST_STATUS) VALUES (#{taHomeNum}, #{taAwayNum}, #{mrHomeScore}, #{mrAwayScore}, #{mrWinNum}, #{mrLoseNum}, #{mrHomeMannerPoint}, #{mrAwayMannerPoint}, #{mrRequestStatus})
